title: Ben Pobjoy from Hot Charity Records
itunes:title: Ben Pobjoy from Hot Charity Records
description:
I am extremely excited to bring you this in depth conversation with an old friend and a person who's work ethic and artistic expression I hold in great regard. Ben Pobjoy runs a record label called Hot Charity Records (a division of XL Recordings) as well as working ad an ad agency in Toronto while also managing the band Single Mothers. Ben has a long history in punk/hardcore and played in some important bands like Spread The Disease and The Abandoned Hearts Club when he was younger. Our conversation goes all over the place but we discuss art, creativity and the concept of "faking it until you make it". Visit Squarespace and make that idea you've had come to life in the form of a beautiful website.
